name: Dungeon Crawler | Level One | Demo
description:
Crawl a dungeon and slay monsters in this single level demo. Fend of blood thirsty imps, demons imbued with the power of flame and even slimey growths who want to eat your innards! Solve puzzles and collect weapons as you progress, but choose what you take with you carefully. 

I had zero experience with coding and this project is my playground to learn and understand code. Over the last ~3-4 weeks this is what I have created. Enjoy!

Art and Sound:

For the art, initially used 0x72's Dungeon Tileset II then decided to expand on it with my own reconfiguration and additions to the pack (mainly for autotiling), both are available here:

0x72: https://0x72.itch.io/dungeontileset-ii

My reconfig: https://aekae13.itch.io/16x16-dungeon-walls-reconfig

Sounds: opengameart.org

Notes:

If you're so inclined, feel free to comment/message/email with any criticism, suggestions or bugs. I will address issues in future iterations. (If any future iterations)

Made with Godot.
